General.Name: Cloud Technologies S.A
General.Description: Cloud Technologies S.A. engages in the big data marketing and data monetization businesses. The company operates a data management platform under the OnAudience.com brand, which integrates and manages data about Internet users worldwide. It also provides data based marketing services. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Piotr  Soleniec
1.Title: Group CFO & Member of Management Board
